attributes.additional_details:
Force the government call a general election now, not in 2015.
Its quite clear the government is out of touch.
they are bringing the country down to its knees.
People having benefits stopped,
rising fuel bills,
rising taxes.
food banks opening everywhere.
suicide rates rising.
homelessness rising
people will soon be in the workhouses.
no jobs, because of rising immigration.

sign this now to call for an election, to get these out of touch people out.
